settings.content: You can find the link to our theme documentation in Storefront > My Themes. Click the 'Theme Details' button - the link to the documentation is under the 'Support and Documentation' heading.
If you need assistance with the theme, please email us: support@flairconsultancy.com
Show price ranges for products with variants - if disabled, will show the product price
When your store is configured to show prices including and excluding tax, choose which is styled as the primary price

settings.label: When displaying only single prices including or excluding taxes, show the (inc./ex. tax) label?

settings.content: Choose whether to hide pricing and add to cart buttons or lock down the store if customers aren't logged in.

settings.label: Stop new accounts (not in a group) from seeing prices
Hide Home Page Promotions if Entire Catalog is Hidden
Stop customers from reaching the checkout unless they meet a minimum order value
Show Multi Add link in the navigation
Allow customers to enter a quantity and add to cart in the product listing pages
Show quantity already in cart on product cards
Show "Quick Add by SKU" forms in the header and mini carts
Show login box on the homepage
Enable the mini side cart on category/brand/search listings
Show SKUs in the mini cart and on the cart page
Allow customers to save their carts
Show customers their recently viewed items on home, product and category pages
Enable featured categories on the home page

settings.content: Refer to the documentation! Match this to the top level category which you want to hold "Featured Categories".

settings.label: Hide category names in featured category grid
Stop the top level featured category from appearing in the main navigation bar

settings.content: Please specify maximum image sizes for desktop displays. We'll automatically scale down images for smaller devices.

settings.label: Thumbnail image in cart and other pages

settings.content: By default the theme doesn’t load most images until the user scrolls to them on the screen. Enable "Lazyloading with LQIP" below if you prefer to show a preview image and replace it with a better quality version as the user scrolls. Select "Disabled" below to fully turn off this feature.

settings.label: Hide web pages in main navigation

settings.content: You will need to upload an SVG file into your store's WebDAV folder before this will work. Our theme documentation explains how to do so. Note that you will still need to upload a standard image based logo in your store control panel for your invoices, packing notes, emails etc.
Social accounts must be set up to use this feature.

settings.label: Show "©", current year and store name

settings.content: If you've purchased a GeoTrust SSL from BigCommerce, check your BigCommerce Account Dashboard for the correct Common Name to use here.

settings.label: Enable contextual navigation on category and brand pages
Stop category images appearing in the header section
Show quantity selection on product pages

settings.content: * For texture swatches, max dimensions are 150x150.
